content: crochet a cute and simple **circle to square granny square** learn how to turn a granny circle into a square with this easy-to-follow pattern and make colorful and modern afghan blocks for your blankets bags dresses and any creations with granny squares *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** any yarn appropriate crochet hook size tapestry needle **size** with **dk weight cotton** and a **3 0 mm** 11 uk hook 2 7 7 cm with **aran weight cotton** and a **4 5 mm** g/7 us 7 uk hook 3 7 9 5 cm **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are the property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
